summary: Dame Margot Fonteyn DBE  was an English ballerina.
full_text: Dame Margot Fonteyn de Arias, DBE , was an English ballerina. She is widely regarded as one of the greatest classical ballet dancers of all time. She spent her entire career as a dancer with The Royal Ballet, eventually being appointed Prima Ballerina Assoluta of the company by Queen Elizabeth II.
title: Margot Fonteyn
